trip.title: Spring in Paris
trip.description: A romantic week in the city of lights, exploring art, culture, and cuisine.

activities.title: Arrival & Check-in
activities.description: Check-in at the hotel and freshen up.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.location: Bateaux Parisiens, Port de la Bourdonnais
activities.description: Relaxing cruise along the Seine River to see major landmarks.

activities.title: Welcome Dinner
activities.description: Fine dining with a view of Paris from the Eiffel Tower.
activities.notes: Reservation under Smith, 8 PM. Smart casual dress code.

activities.title: Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa.
activities.notes: Skip-the-line tickets for 9 AM. Audio guide available.

activities.title: Lunch in Le Marais
activities.location: L'As du Fallafel, Rue des Rosiers
activities.description: Famous falafel spot in the historic Jewish quarter.
activities.notes: Cash only. Try the special falafel pita.

activities.title: Notre-Dame & Île de la Cité
activities.description: Visit the iconic cathedral and explore the historic island.
activities.notes: Check for any post-restoration visiting hours.

activities.title: Day Trip to Versailles
activities.description: Full day exploring the opulent palace and gardens.
activities.notes: Train from Paris Montparnasse at 8:30 AM. Pack comfortable shoes.

activities.title: Eiffel Tower Summit
activities.description: Early morning visit to the top of the Eiffel Tower.
activities.notes: Tickets for 9:30 AM summit access. Arrive 30 mins early for security.

activities.title: Musée d'Orsay
activities.description: Impressionist masterpieces in a beautiful former train station.
activities.notes: Tickets for 2 PM. Don't miss the Van Gogh collection.

activities.title: Montmartre Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore the artistic neighborhood, Sacré-Cœur, and Place du Tertre.
activities.notes: Wear comfortable shoes. Tour lasts 2.5 hours.

activities.title: Moulin Rouge Show
activities.description: Evening show at the world-famous cabaret.
activities.notes: Dress code: Elegant attire. Show starts at 9 PM, dinner at 7:30 PM.

activities.title: Shopping in Champs-Élysées
activities.description: Luxury shopping and iconic Parisian stores.
activities.notes: Visit Ladurée for macarons. Consider tax-free shopping options.

activities.title: Arc de Triomphe
activities.description: Climb to the top for panoramic views of Paris.
activities.notes: 284 steps to the top. Included in Paris Museum Pass.

activities.title: Day Trip to Giverny
activities.description: Visit Claude Monet's house and famous water lily gardens.
activities.notes: Train from Gare Saint-Lazare. Pack a picnic lunch.

activities.title: Luxembourg Gardens
activities.description: Relaxing morning in the beautiful gardens before departure.
activities.notes: Perfect spot for people watching and a final Parisian coffee.

activities.title: Airport Transfer
activities.description: Private transfer to the airport for return flight.
activities.notes: Pickup at hotel at 2 PM. Flight at 5:30 PM.

accommodation.name: Hotel Le Marais
accommodation.address: 2 Rue de la Verrerie, 75004 Paris, France
accommodation.notes: Located in the heart of Le Marais, close to metro stations.

transportation.notes: Round-trip tickets purchased. 10-minute walk to palace from station.

expenses.notes: Paid with credit card, 2x points on travel
Train tickets + Palace entry + Audio guides

notes.title: Emergency Contacts
notes.content:
US Embassy: +33 1 43 12 22 22
Local Emergency: 112
Travel Insurance: +1-800-123-4567 (Policy #T123456789)

notes.title: Local Customs
notes.content:
- Always greet with "Bonjour" before starting a conversation
- Tipping is usually included in the bill (service compris)
- Keep small change for public restrooms
- Learn basic French phrases

notes.title: Packing List
notes.content:
- Comfortable walking shoes
- Umbrella or rain jacket
- Universal power adapter
- Copies of important documents
- Medications and prescriptions
- Reusable water bottle
